OAT.data

Interface OHLC

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Price
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bar, BarDataset, ContractChart, RealTimeChart, TickChart, TimeChart

    public interface OHLC
extends Price
    Interface for Open-High-Low-Close bar.
